entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
